content: {"Name": "Altamont Community Food Pantry", "Entity_Id": 48, "Category": "Food Pantry", "Subcategory": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "Organization": "Altamont Community Food Pantry", "More_Information": "Guest can use pantry twice a month. Appointments preferred.  \"Orders\" are placed via email or over the, phone, a time for pick up is scheduled and the items are on a cart outside the door. Guests also have the option of making an appointment to come in and select the items themselves. Only 1 guest is allowed at a time.\r\n\r\nFor the month of June, pantry will be open 2nd and 4th Mondays, June 9th and 23rd.", "Counties": ["Albany"], "Location": "", "Address": "122 Grand Street", "City": "Altamont", "State": "NY", "Zip": "12009", "Phone": "518-861-6542", "Hours_of_Operation": "1st and 3rd Monday 12-5", "Cost": "", "Accepts": "", "Website": "https://www.altamontvillage.org/business-directory/altamont-food-pantry", "Coalition": 1, "CFAN": 0, "Latitude": "42.700008828475944", "Longitude": "-74.02871231517831", "Last_Updated": "05-30-2025", "icon": "marker-F42000", "collection_name": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "collection_category": "Food Pantry"}
